document.full_text: a motorcyclist threw a home-made grenade into an anti-government "yellow shirt" rally in central bangkok late on tuesday, injuring two men, police said.
document.title: grenade injures two at bangkok "yellow shirt" rally
lines_and_colors: a motorcyclist threw a home-made grenade into an anti-government "yellow shirt" rally in central bangkok late on tuesday, injuring two men, police said.
